body_html: @andrewharp I changed it to copy the file from res/raw to cache temporarily, then map it and delete the copy. Even with the copy, this version takes the create to .6 seconds on average, from 1.6 seconds that I previously benchmarked using the assets/ and IO, with min .3 seconds/max 1.2seconds. It requires that you pass in the model file without the pb extension as a resource id and of course store the file in res/raw. I have tried to clean up the ws again.

body: @andrewharp I changed it to copy the file from res/raw to cache temporarily, then map it and delete the copy.  Even with the copy, this version takes the create to **.6 seconds on average,** from 1.6 seconds that I previously benchmarked using the assets/ and IO, with min .3 seconds/max 1.2seconds. It requires that you pass in the model file without the pb extension as a  resource id and of course store the file in res/raw.  I have tried to clean up the ws again.
